    Other Links

    WING Seminars:

    1. WING NLP Seminars: https://wing-nus.github.io/nlp-seminar/

    Other Related Seminars:

    1. Stanford NLP Seminars: https://nlp.stanford.edu/seminar/
    2. Berkeley NLP Seminars: https://nlp.berkeley.edu/
    3. Columbia NLP Seminars: http://www.cs.columbia.edu/~eallaway/nlp_seminar.html

    Our group also host a CS6101 reading group on NLP and related topics.

    One recent one on Conversational Recommendation Systems: https://wing-nus.github.io/cs6101 and more:

    1. Deep Reinforcement Learning - http://www.comp.nus.edu.sg/~kanmy/courses/6101_1820
    2. Deep Learning for NLP (reprise) - http://www.comp.nus.edu.sg/~kanmy/courses/6101_1810
    3. Deep Learning via Fast.AI - http://www.comp.nus.edu.sg/~kanmy/courses/6101_2017_2/
    4. Deep Learning for Vision - http://www.comp.nus.edu.sg/~kanmy/courses/6101_2017/
    5. Deep Learning for NLP - http://www.comp.nus.edu.sg/~kanmy/courses/6101_2016_2/
    6. MOOC Research - http://www.comp.nus.edu.sg/~kanmy/courses/6101_2016/
